name: npc-standen-new
description: Dev convenience for running frontend and backend together

scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c green,cyan "node scripts/start-backend-if-needed.mjs" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.start: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c green,cyan "npm run start --prefix backend" "npm run preview --prefix frontend"
